channel.title: Help With Website Choice
channel.description: I own a domain name for my server and have previously used .webs and .weeby. I would like to use another builder that I can register my domain to with better apps/forums. Either that or a really good website for embeddable forums. Enjin is out due to the monthly cost. 000webhost is a last resort because I find it confusing. <<*cue senior member facepalm*

item.title: Help With Website Choice
item.dc:creator: @Turmoilz1337x Turmoilz1337x
item.description:
@Turmoilz1337x wrote:

Help? I’m looking to make something such as arrav’s website. I’m new to that stuff. I need a forums, webclient, donations, etc. But I want it simple to understand. IDK. I have some PayPal I can throw your way for some help…

Read full topic

item.title: Help With Website Choice
item.dc:creator: @The_Web_Guy The Web Guy
item.description:
@The_Web_Guy wrote:

Facepalm
000webhost allows you to upload files and create databases, it’s not a website builder. I encourage you to make your own, as it’s really easy…

Read full topic
